documents.document: @_ChrisBascombe Have we had 1 peno in 2018 ?

@FionaKenny1 But you never know .... Who would have thought when we were winning Eurovisions but in the toilet of Rugby that we’d be both International Team & Club European Champions 20 years later ! Not bad for a small country ☘️💚 #GoRyan
@FionaKenny1 You don’t ask for much !! 💙☘️
